--- title: "Fjármál stjórnmálaflokkanna" author: - name: "Brynjólfur Gauti Guðrúnar Jónsson" url: "https://twitter.com/bgautijonsson" affiliation: "Tölfræði, Raunvísindadeild Háskóla Íslands" affiliation-url: "https://www.hi.is/tolfraedi_0" date: "2022/08/13" format: html: code-fold: true toc: true toc-depth: 2 toc-location: right toc-title: Efnisyfirlit page-layout: full smooth-scroll: true link-external-newwindow: true execute: echo: true warning: false cache: false editor: source draft: false title-block-banner: true categories: - stjórnmál - efnahagur - ársreikningar - R - íslenska --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} usr <- config::get("postgres_user") con <- dbConnect(RPostgres::Postgres(), dbname = usr$dbname, host = usr$host, port = usr$port, user = usr$username, password = usr$password) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} d <- tbl(con, "arsreikningar_stjornmalaflokka") |> collect() |> mutate_all(~ ifelse(is.na(.), 0, .)) |> inner_join( vnv() |> group_by(ar = year(date)) |> summarise(cpi = mean(cpi)) |> mutate(cpi = cpi / cpi[ar == max(ar)]), by = "ar" ) xS <- "#e41a1c" xV <- "#238b45" xD <- "#377eb8" xP <- "#984ea3" xB <- "#b2df8a" xBF <- "#cab2d6" xC <- "#ff7f00" xM <- "#08306b" xFF <- "#fee391" Annad <- "#e5d8bd" ``` ::: # Framlög til stjórnmálaflokka ## Ríkissjóður ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.621'} ```{.r .cell-code} plot_dat <- d |> mutate(framlog = (framlog_rikis + framlog_althingi) / cpi) |> select(ar, flokkur, framlog) |> mutate(flokkur = fct_reorder(flokkur, framlog, .fun = sum)) p <- plot_dat |> ggplot(aes(ar, framlog)) + geom_col(aes(fill = flokkur), position = "fill", colour = "grey95", width = 1) + scale_x_continuous() + scale_y_continuous(labels = label_percent()) + scale_fill_manual(values = c( xFF, xC, xM, xP, xB, xV, xS, xD )) + coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) + theme_half_open() + theme(legend.position = "none") + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL, title = "Dreifing framlaga ríkissjóðs á stjórnmálaflokka (2007 - 2020)") ggplotly( p ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Sveitarfélög ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.621'} ```{.r .cell-code} plot_dat <- d |> mutate(framlog = framlog_svf / cpi) |> select(ar, flokkur, framlog) |> mutate(flokkur = fct_reorder(flokkur, framlog, .fun = sum)) p <- plot_dat |> ggplot(aes(ar, framlog)) + geom_col(aes(fill = flokkur), position = "fill", colour = "grey95", width = 1) + scale_x_continuous() + scale_y_continuous(labels = label_percent()) + scale_fill_manual(values = c( xFF, xC, xM, xP, xB, xV, xS, xD )) + coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) + theme_half_open() + theme(legend.position = "none") + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL, title = "Dreifing framlaga sveitarfélaga á stjórnmálaflokka (2007 - 2020)") ggplotly( p ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Fyrirtæki og lögaðilar ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.621'} ```{.r .cell-code} plot_dat <- d |> mutate(framlog = framlog_fyrirtaekja / cpi) |> select(ar, flokkur, framlog) |> mutate(flokkur = fct_reorder(flokkur, framlog, .fun = sum)) p <- plot_dat |> ggplot(aes(ar, framlog)) + geom_col(aes(fill = flokkur), position = "fill", colour = "grey95", width = 1) + scale_x_continuous() + scale_y_continuous(labels = label_percent()) + scale_fill_manual(values = c( xFF, xC, xM, xP, xB, xV, xS, xD )) + coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) + theme_half_open() + theme(legend.position = "none") + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL, title = "Dreifing framlaga fyrirtækja/lögaðila á stjórnmálaflokka (2007 - 2020)") ggplotly( p ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Aðrar tekjur ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.621'} ```{.r .cell-code} plot_dat <- d |> mutate(framlog = adrar_tekjur / cpi) |> select(ar, flokkur, framlog) |> mutate(flokkur = fct_reorder(flokkur, framlog, .fun = sum)) p <- plot_dat |> ggplot(aes(ar, framlog)) + geom_col(aes(fill = flokkur), position = "fill", colour = "grey95", width = 1) + scale_x_continuous() + scale_y_continuous(labels = label_percent()) + scale_fill_manual(values = c( xFF, xC, xM, xP, xB, xV, xS, xD )) + coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) + theme_half_open() + theme(legend.position = "none") + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL, title = "Dreifing annarra tekna stjórnmálaflokka (2007 - 2020)") ggplotly( p ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Heildartekjur ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.621'} ```{.r .cell-code} plot_dat <- d |> mutate(framlog = tekjur / cpi) |> select(ar, flokkur, framlog) |> mutate(flokkur = fct_reorder(flokkur, framlog, .fun = sum)) p <- plot_dat |> ggplot(aes(ar, framlog)) + geom_col(aes(fill = flokkur), position = "fill", colour = "grey95", width = 1) + scale_x_continuous() + scale_y_continuous(labels = label_percent()) + scale_fill_manual(values = c( xFF, xC, xM, xP, xV, xB, xS, xD )) + coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) + theme_half_open() + theme(legend.position = "none") + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL, title = "Dreifing heildartekna stjórnmálaflokka (2007 - 2020)") ggplotly( p ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Einstaklingar ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.621'} ```{.r .cell-code} plot_dat <- d |> mutate(framlog = framlog_einstaklinga / cpi) |> select(ar, flokkur, framlog) |> mutate(flokkur = fct_reorder(flokkur, framlog, .fun = sum)) p <- plot_dat |> ggplot(aes(ar, framlog)) + geom_col(aes(fill = flokkur), position = "fill", colour = "grey95", width = 1) + scale_x_continuous() + scale_y_continuous(labels = label_percent()) + scale_fill_manual(values = c( xFF, xC, xM, xP, xB, xV, xS, xD )) + coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) + theme_half_open() + theme(legend.position = "none") + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL, title = "Dreifing framlaga einstaklinga á stjórnmálaflokka (2007 - 2020)") ggplotly( p ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: # Eignir, skuldir og eigið fé ## Eignir ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.621'} ```{.r .cell-code} plot_dat <- d |> mutate(framlog = eignir / cpi) |> select(ar, flokkur, framlog) |> mutate(flokkur = fct_reorder(flokkur, framlog, .fun = sum)) p <- plot_dat |> ggplot(aes(ar, framlog)) + geom_col(aes(fill = flokkur), position = "fill", colour = "grey95", width = 1) + scale_x_continuous() + scale_y_continuous(labels = label_percent()) + scale_fill_manual(values = c( xC, xFF, xM, xP, xV, xS, xB, xD )) + coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) + theme_half_open() + theme(legend.position = "none") + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL, title = "Dreifing eigna stjórnmálaflokka (2007 - 2020)") ggplotly( p ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Skuldir ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.621'} ```{.r .cell-code} plot_dat <- d |> mutate(framlog = skuldir / cpi) |> select(ar, flokkur, framlog) |> mutate(flokkur = fct_reorder(flokkur, framlog, .fun = sum)) p <- plot_dat |> ggplot(aes(ar, framlog)) + geom_col(aes(fill = flokkur), position = "fill", colour = "grey95", width = 1) + scale_x_continuous() + scale_y_continuous(labels = label_percent()) + scale_fill_manual(values = c( xC, xFF, xM, xP, xV, xS, xB, xD )) + coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) + theme_half_open() + theme(legend.position = "none") + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL, title = "Dreifing skulda stjórnmálaflokka (2007 - 2020)") ggplotly( p ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## Eigið fé ::: {.cell fig.asp='0.621'} ```{.r .cell-code} plot_dat <- d |> mutate(framlog = (eignir - skuldir) / cpi, framlog = ifelse(framlog < 0, 0, framlog)) |> select(ar, flokkur, framlog) |> mutate(flokkur = fct_reorder(flokkur, framlog, .fun = sum)) p <- plot_dat |> ggplot(aes(ar, framlog)) + geom_col(aes(fill = flokkur), position = "fill", colour = "grey95", width = 1) + scale_x_continuous() + scale_y_continuous(labels = label_percent()) + scale_fill_manual(values = c( xC, xFF, xM, xP, xV, xS, xB, xD )) + coord_cartesian(expand = FALSE) + theme_half_open() + theme(legend.position = "none") + labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, fill = NULL, title = "Dreifing eigin fjár stjórnmálaflokka (2007 - 2020)") ggplotly( p ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: :::
